title: Image Contributions
content: The Duterte Times effort is looking for Creative Commons Licensed images for news articles and other site uses. Images add value for site visitors and readers. Send images and information through email or Twitter direct message.

title: Information Contributions
content: The Duterte Times effort believes in promoting information dissemination to the public and is looking for Creative Commons Licensed information. These information will build the site database and add value for site site visitors and readers. Please send an email for more information.
